= Vimwiki_Keybindings =

== Wiki_Management ==

| Action     |                       |
|------------|-----------------------|
| <leader>ww | open wiki index file  |
| <leader>wt | open index in new tab |
| <leader>ws | list and select wikis |
| <leader>wd | delete wiki page      |
| <leader>wr | rename wiki page      |

== Diary_Management ==

| Action                      |                                             |
|-----------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| <leader>wi                  | open diary index file for wiki              |
| <leader>w<leader>i          | update current diary index                  |
| <leader>w <leader>w         | open today's diary file for wiki            |
| <leader>w<leader>t          | open today's diary file for wiki in new tab |
| <C-Up>                      | open previous day's diary                   |
| <C-Down>                    | open next day's diary                       |

== Navigation ==

| Action                      |                                             |
|-----------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| <CR>                        | follow/create wiki link                     |
| <C-S-CR>                    | follow/create wiki link in new tab          |
| <backspace>                 | go back to previous wiki page               |
| <Tab>                       | go to next link on current page             |
| <S-Tab>                     | go to previous link on current page         |

== Editing ==

| Action    |                              |
|-----------|------------------------------|
| <C-Space> | toggle list item on/off      |
| =         | add header level             |
| -         | remove header level          |
| +         | create/decorate links        |
| glm       | increase indent of list item |
| gll       | decrease indent of list item |
| gl8       | switch or insert "*" symbol  |
| gl3       | switch or insert "#" symbol  |
| gl-       | switch or insert "-" symbol  |
| gl1       | switch or insert "1." symbol |

== Table_Shortcuts ==

| Action     |                                   |
|------------|-----------------------------------|
| <A-Left>   | move column left                  |
| <A-right>  | move column right                 |
| <CR>       | (insert mode) go down/create cell |
| <Tab>      | (insert mode) go next/create cell |
| gqq or gww | reformat table                    |

== Text_Objects ==

| Object |                                                       |
|--------|-------------------------------------------------------|
| ah     | section btw 2 headings including empty trailing lines |
| ih     | section btw 2 headings excluding empty trailing lines |
| a\     | table cell                                            |
| i\     | inner table cell                                      |
| ac     | table column                                          |
| ic     | inner table column                                    |
